reviews.review_text:
Visited for dinner and had good food for very reasonable price. Ordered the chicken lollipop which we felt like the coating was a bit too much and it was undercooked.
But our main-course was amazing and very tasty.
Would give 5 stars easily for the service they provide , the quality of the main course , price and the ambience.
Would definitely suggest to visit them with your family and friends.
Live music was an added plus. üòÑ

MUST VISIT ‚ù§Ô∏è

The Owner: Mahen
The Servers: Ganesh, Manik, Santosh
The food üî•üî•

We 4 friends(Guys) went to explore Goan culture and we stumbled upon this exquisite place called Om Lawn from word of mouth reference by a lady who sells coconut water.

The service + food is fantastic!
We went there for 3 meals, tried Chicken Sukkha, Chicken Amarti, Red Snapper Tandoori, Chonok (Cafreal, Grill, Rechado), Prawn Sukkha, Lepo fish curry
Everything was absolutely spot on! The servers are very polite and suggested delicious food.
This hidden gem is worth visiting and I cannot praise Mahen enough for his business since it is less than 10yrs old. He is very polite and even greeted us when we were having our food.

They also have a family cafe called Praveen Cafe which was opened by his father, I would recommend to try it as well.

Every dish ordered was absolutely delicious. The ambience could be made a little better. However that is secondary, as the food was wow! The staff were polite and attentive.
Would definitely recommend üëç
